articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Jon Ki Ryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Jon Ki Ryon
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Tuesday sent a wreath to the bier of Jon Ki Ryon, a general officer of the KPA, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: U. S. reporters to be indicted for illegal entry
articles.content:
U.S. reporters to be indicted for illegal entry
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The illegal entry of U.S. reporters into the DPRK and their suspected hostile acts have been confirmed by evidence and their statements, according to the results of intermediary investigation conducted by a competent organ of the DPRK.
					 The organ is carrying on its investigation and, at the same time, making a preparation for indicting them at a trial on the basis of the already confirmed suspicions.
					
					 While the investigation is under way consular contact is allowed and the treatment of U.S. reporters, etc. are given according to the relevant international laws.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Its Gag on Press
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Its Gag on Press
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea released a statement on Monday as regards the fact that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are these days getting evermore pronounced in the scheme to gag the press and put media under its control in south Korea.
					 After taking office the Lee group replaced all chiefs of media organs, including the Broadcasting and Communication Committee which supervises the broadcasting and news services in south Korea and main broadcasting services, with its liegemen in order to suppress the progressive media and put media as a whole under its control. And it is nowadays trying to amend the laws on media so that such venal newspapers as Chosun Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo may monopolize broadcasting services.
					
					 Meanwhile, the group is violently cracking down on the media organs offending it.
					
					 Such moves of the group are an intolerable, undemocratic and traitorous criminal deed intended to turn media into a reptile mouthpiece serving for its establishment of fascist ruling system and scheme of confrontation with fellow countrymen, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The press speaks for justice and guides the era.
					
					 But, now in south Korea media can not freely tell the truth due to the fascist suppression by the group of traitors, while the ultra-right conservative media organs are misleading public opinion to curry favor with the puppet clique, running amuck as if a golden chance presented to themselves.
					
					 There is no room for the reactionary media organs and pressmen to stay as they incite antagonism, distrust and confrontation among the fellow countrymen, in partnership with the Lee group of traitors.
					
					 We will sternly settle accounts with the conservative media organs and pressmen of south Korea that are viciously slandering the DPRK while acting a disgraceful venal mouthpiece for the group of traitors.

articles.title: Powerful Base for Scientific and Technological Development
articles.content:
Powerful Base for Scientific and Technological Development
Pyongyang, March 31(KCNA) -- The Hamhung Branch of the State Academy of Sciences on the east coast of the DPRK is a powerful scientific research base with a solid material and technical foundation.
					The branch academy founded by President Kim Il Sung has established Juche in scientific researches in the past to create the vinalon industry based on the local raw materials and technology and successfully solve the scientific and technological problems arising in the development of the chemical industry, with the result that it has made a contribution to the development of the light industry and agriculture.
					
					It has invented and introduced a method of restoring the slogans written on trees during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and preserving them forever so as to convey the undying revolutionary exploits performed by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu to the coming generations, which is a great success made by the branch academy.
					
					In particular, it has developed a technique for making new goods from the intermediate product of vinalon and registered various research achievements since the visit of General Secretary Kim Jong Il to the branch academy in March, Juche 88 (1999). Its successes are greatly conducive to the strengthening of the Juche character of the chemical industry.
					
					On the other hand, the scientists and technicians there have solved satisfactorily the urgent scientific and technological problems arising in the building of a great, prosperous and powerful socialist nation through brisk activities of the "February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians". 
					
					They are now engaged in researches into putting the production of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, February 8 Vinalon Complex and other industrial establishments in various sectors of the national economy on a normal track.

articles.title: Ideological and Theoretical Exploits of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Ideological and Theoretical Exploits of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Today is the 27th anniversary of the publication of Kim Jong Il's famous work, "On the Juche Idea." The Korean people, with deep emotion, take this opportunity to look back upon his brilliant ideological and theoretical exploits made for the times and revolution.
					While guiding the revolution for tens of years, he has enriched President Kim Il Sung's idea, Juche idea, as the guiding idea for the era of independence and given perfect answers to all the theoretical and practical questions arising in the socialist construction through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					He, with a firm determination to further develop the revolutionary idea of the President from long ago, has poured his thinking and energy into the deep study of the Juche idea and, at the same time, energetically read and analyzed the preceding theories.
					
					In this course, he became deeply aware that the revolutionary idea of the President is the only guiding idea of the new era.
					
					In the 1970s when the socialist construction was pushed ahead in full swing in the country he formulated the President's idea into an integrated system of idea, theory and methodology of Juche and proclaimed the program of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.
					
					Although he was busy with the leadership over the overall work of the Party, army and state, he continued energetic ideological and theoretical activities to enrich and develop the Juche idea as the guiding idea for the era of independence.
					
					On March 31, Juche 71 (1982) he made public his famous work "On the Juche Idea" in which he systemized the revolutionary idea in a comprehensive way.
					
					The work elucidates in a scientific and theoretical way the man-centered philosophical outlook on the world, the socio-historical outlook evolved with the popular masses, the maker of history, as the center and the guiding principles of the Juche idea. As soon as the work was published, it evoked a great response at home and abroad.
					
					Kim Jong Il authored more works such as "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea" and "On Having a Correct Viewpoint and Understanding of the Juche Philosophy" and thus further enriched and developed the Juche idea.
					
					In addition, he developed in depth the Juche-oriented theory on socialism based on the guiding idea of the era of independence with his indefatigable ideological and theoretical activities for protecting and glorifying the man-centered Korean-style socialism.
					
					He in his many famous works advanced in an all-round way the tasks to defend and develop the Korean-style socialism based on the scientific guiding idea. Typical of the works are "On Some Problems of the Ideological Foundation of Socialism," "Socialism of Our Country Is a Socialism of Our Style As the Embodiment of the Juche Idea" and "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party".
					
					The ideological and theoretical feats he has performed for the country and people, the times and revolution, with his extraordinary wisdom and energetic ideological and theoretical activities will be imperishable forever.

articles.title: March That Led to Victory by Great Mental Power
articles.content:
March That Led to Victory by Great Mental Power
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Seventy years have passed since the main unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) led by President Kim Il Sung made the historic arduous march. Now the Korean people are looking back on the grim days of struggle with deep emotion. 
					This march continued for more than 100 days from December Juche 27 (1938) to March next year. It was a road of ordeals surpassing human imagination and a glorious course in which the unit emerged victorious in bloody battles by fighting like an immortal day and night. 
					
					In that winter the Japanese imperialists fell upon the unit tenaciously on all sides by setting in motion a huge force hundreds of thousands strong and even flying corps, making the KPRA headquarters as the main target of the so-called "massive clean-up operation".
					
					To make matters worse, food ran out in the severe cold around 40 degrees Celsius below zero coupled with heaviest snowfall in 100 years. Under this worst condition the main unit of the KPRA had to fight bloody battles with the enemy coming in attack desperately in the front and rear and right and left every day. 
					
					This march involving struggles with rigorous element, acute food shortage and fatigue, terrible diseases and the brutal enemy was a hard fight accompanied by a struggle with oneself for surmounting bitter ordeals. 
					
					But difficulty could not break the indomitable mental power and will of the guerrillas who were confident that the Korean revolution would surely win as long as they were guided by the President. 
					
					In the days of the march, they defended with their very lives, politically and ideologically, the President who constantly fortified their revolutionary fighting spirit, looking after them with paternal affection, and trounced the enemy by bold and superb commanding art and guerrilla tactics. And they solidified the unity and cohesion of the unit.
					
					The loser in the battles for more than one hundred days that lifted the Korean revolution to a new upsurge was none other than the Japanese imperialist aggressors who blared they would "totally destroy" the KPRA.
					
					The spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the indomitable fighting spirit, the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and hard struggle and revolutionary optimism displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners in those days are being steadily carried forward by the younger generation today, named the spirit of "Arduous March", and they serve as an ideological and mental weapon in the struggle of the Korean people to build a great, prosperous and powerful socialist nation without fail, breaking through whatever difficulty.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Japan's Anti-DPRK Ruckus
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Japan's Anti-DPRK Ruckus
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The unsavory forces hostile to the DPRK are going reckless in their moves to deter the DPRK's projected launch of "Kwangmyongsong-2," an experimental communication satellite for peaceful purposes. Japan is taking the lead in this racket though it has committed the biggest crimes against the DPRK. 
					 Japanese authorities including Prime Minister Aso are making much ado, asserting that the above-said satellite launch poses a "threat" to their security. Ship-and ground-based interceptor missiles and monitoring means of the "Self-Defense Forces (SDF)" are being deployed in the East Sea of Korea and its vicinity.
					
					 They are asserting that in case the satellite is launched, Japan will independently apply additional sanctions against the DPRK and bring up the issue for discussion at the UNSC.
					
					 They blustered that they would "intercept" the DPRK's satellite, counting on the support from their master. But when their master flinched because of the strong stand of the Korean People's Army, they found themselves in such a miserable position as to modify their assertion by uttering that they would intercept it only when the debris of the multi-stage carrier rocket falls down on the land of Japan.
					
					 Clear is the reason why Japan is kicking up such a row to disturb the world, doggedly insisting that the DPRK's launch of satellite is aimed at developing the missile technology. The primary aim sought by Japan through this is to bring the six-party talks to collapse and delay the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and thus justify its ambition for nuclear weaponization.
					
					 Looking back on the history of the six-party talks, Japan has done only wicked and wrong things obstructive to the denuclearization of the peninsula since their very start. The whole world, to say nothing of the parties to the talks, has a common understanding of this.
					
					 Japan has opposed every effort to abide by the principle of "action for action" for the denuclearization as evidenced by its stand against the delisting of the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" and persistent refusal to fulfil its commitment to offer energy.
					
					 Japan's deliberate obstruction is intended to frustrate the denuclearization of the peninsula at any cost in a bid to secure a pretext for justifying its nuclear weaponization.
					
					 Another aim sought by Japan through this is to use the DPRK's satellite launch as the best pretext for facilitating the militarization of the Japanese society and weathering its political crisis.
					
					 As the Japanese authorities admitted, they have neither guarantee nor conviction that they can intercept the DPRK's satellite.
					
					 What they seek more than anything else through their opposition to the said satellite launch is political and military aims.
					
					 In other words, they are working hard to focus the attention of the people at home disillusioned with the corrupt political landscape on "threat to security" with an eye to incite militarism, gain time to tide over the political crisis and lay a springboard from which to push forward in real earnest the moves to turn Japan into a military power including the building of a joint missile shield with the U.S. in the future.
					
					 This is the ulterior aim sought by Japan in hyping "the missile threat from north Korea."
					
					 The war blackmail and all other hostile acts Japan is resorting to, describing only the DPRK's satellite launch as the development of missile technology are little short of a declaration that Japan does not recognize the September 19 joint statement calling for embodying "the spirit of mutual respect and equality." This is, in the final analysis, an act of overturning the six-party talks.
					
					 The DPRK is not afraid of any attempt of Japan to intercept "Kwangmyongsong-2." 
					
					  Should Japan dare recklessly intercept the DPRK's satellite, its army will consider this as the start of Japan's war of reinvasion more than six decades after the Second World War and mercilessly destroy all its interceptor means and citadels with the most powerful military means.

articles.title: Japan's Scheme for Overseas Aggression Rapped
articles.content:
Japan's Scheme for Overseas Aggression Rapped
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Recently Japan included the 13,950-ton class carrier-style escort ship carrying helicopters aboard, called Hyuga, in the Maritime "Self-Defense Force."
					 The deployment of Hyuga for military action reminds one of the hateful picture of Japan in the "era of empire" which was ill-famed for its aggression, plunder, murder and arson, and herein lies the danger of the manufacture and deployment of the ship, Rodong Sinmun today in a signed commentary says.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 A carrier played the pivotal role in conducting the Japanese imperialists' past operations for overseas aggression. After the Second World War, the Japanese reactionaries had directed priority efforts to bolstering up the naval force, the manufacture of modern battleships in particular, in order to make preparations for overseas aggression.
					
					 Japan's plan for production of such large-size warships as an aircraft carrier itself is illegal and dangerous in view of its "Pacifist Constitution".
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have further rounded off the military preparations for reviving the past picture of Japan in the "era of empire" and staging the naval offensive operation in full gear.
					
					 They are making desperate efforts to start the reinvasion, dreamed up by it for decades after the war, by fostering and escalating disputes in Asia and other regions while furthering the SDF's overseas military operation.
					
					 No one knows when they will provoke a military clash against the DPRK, their first target, as they have pushed forward the preparations for overseas aggression with much pain for scores of years after the war in an attempt to revenge Japan's past defeat.
					
					 The Japanese bellicose forces should be mindful that they are bound to go to ruin if they continue getting hell-bent on such moves.

articles.title: Japan's Ambition for Overseas Expansion Assailed
articles.content:
Japan's Ambition for Overseas Expansion Assailed
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Some time ago, the Japan Foreign Ministry worked out the "diplomatic blue book" for 2009 and presented it to the joint meeting on foreign relations of the Liberal Democratic Party. It asserted that Tok Islet belonged to Japan, citing what it called historical facts and international law. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a signed commentary cites facts to prove that by nature Japan is ill-famed for invading other countries and depriving others of their wealth. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Of late Japan obsessed with the wild ambition for militarist overseas expansion is running amuck in utter disregard of the diplomatic friction and isolation to be entailed by the territorial disputes with its neighboring countries over the issues of Tok Islet, Diaoyu Islands and Kuril Islands.
					
					 The same is the case with Japan's bid for permanent membership of the UN Security Council. The above-said diplomatic blue book clarified Japan's stand to have the issue of its permanent membership of the UNSC settled.
					
					 The permanent membership of the UNSC is not a seat one can get as one wishes. 
					
					 As well known to the world, Japan is a war criminal state obliged to pay the international community a huge debt called liquidation of its crime-woven past. However, Japan has not yet fulfilled this obligation but is working hard to evade its responsibility.
					
					 World people ridicule Japan dreaming of becoming a dragon from a loach as it is seeking such a high position, turning its face from the above-said urgent task.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to cogitate about why world people call it "political pigmy." 
					
					 Such disgraceful behavior of Japan as dreaming of a political power, persistently pursuing militarist overseas expansion would only invite criticism and derision from all people.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Hit for Bedeviling Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Hit for Bedeviling Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the Lee Myung Bak group, talking about the issue of the inter-Korean relations, let loose again a spate of nonsensical outcries for "tough attitude" and "creation of crisis" by someone. Such assertion is a whopping distortion of the reality and a challenge to the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Lee group insulted the favorably developing inter-Korean relations as "lost decade" and groundlessly slandered the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, approved and supported by all the Koreans, and openly refused to implement them as soon as it took office. This is an undisguised revelation of its "hard-line policy toward the north."
					
					 The group has staged the dangerous joint military exercises against the DPRK, thus quelling the atmosphere of dialogue and peace. Nevertheless, it is labeling the DPRK's steps as "tough attitude" and "creation of crisis." This is a brazen-faced attempt to evade its blame for the prevailing situation and a shameless remark of making fun of the public opinion, which reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 With no wordplay the south Korean authorities can evade their criminal responsibility for having destroyed the inter-Korean relations, which were advancing toward reconciliation and unity, and escalated the confrontation.
					
					 Their sophism will only reveal their true colors as the criminal who is chiefly responsible for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations and aggravated tension.
					
					 If the Lee group feels guilty, it should make a switchover in its policy, though belatedly, far from resorting to such foolish actions as distorting the reality and deceiving the public opinion.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates a signed article to the 27th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea."
					 The Juche idea is a great revolutionary idea that glorified the 20th century as a century of independence and serves as an immortal banner guaranteeing an eternal bright future of the country and the revolution, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The work comprehensively clarifies the idea ranging from the course in which it was founded to its philosophical principle, socio-historical principle, guiding principles and historical significance.  The work, a library of the Juche idea, serves as a banner indicating the path of victory of the revolution in the era of independence. 
					
					The Juche idea has served as ideological and moral pabulum that enabled the army and people of the DPRK to grow strong in their mental power. 
					
					 It was thanks to this great idea which helped the Korean people cultivate the spirit of national independence and strong revolutionary self-esteem that the Korean people emerged a proud people who remained unfettered by any political turbulence which shook the world and stood firm in the worst adversity and rose up like phoenixes to build a land of bliss and usher in a new era of a great prosperous and powerful nation by their own efforts.  
					
					 The Juche idea serves as immortal banner that made the DPRK shed its rays as a great ideological power and a country which has achieved single-minded unity. 
					
					 The Juche idea represents a true world outlook in our era and a great revolutionary doctrine which everybody desirous of independence wholeheartedly accepts and regards as guidelines for struggle. 
					
					 Our single-minded unity in the present era of Songun has grown stronger than ever before as the whole party and army and all the people are united steel strong around the headquarters of the revolution on the basis of the monolithic idea and faith, comradeship and the sense of revolutionary obligation.  This great unity serves as an invincible treasured sword more powerful than a nuclear weapon. 
					
					 The Juche idea serves as a great banner steering the Korean revolution to a bright future of the new century. 
					
					 The Songun idea which the Workers' Party of Korea advanced as a banner for the revolutionary struggle in the new century indicates overall ways for carrying  out the popular masses' cause of independence, proceeding from the principle of Juche. 
					
					 Only when the whole party and army and all the people dynamically struggle, regarding the great Juche idea, the Songun idea as unshakable guidelines, can the Korean people give fuller play to mental power and the DPRK shed more brilliant rays all over the world as an invincible thriving nation, concludes the article.

articles.title: At Least 190 Cases of Aerial Espionage Perpetrated against DPRK in March
articles.content:
At Least 190 Cases of Aerial Espionage Perpetrated against DPRK in March
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet military warmongers perpetrated intensive aerial espionage against the DPRK in March by massively mobilizing strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes with various missions, according to a military source.
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces committed more than 110 cases of aerial espionage and the south Korean puppet forces at least 80 cases, bringing the total number of cases to more than 190.
					
					 They let U-2, RC-7B, RC-12, RC-800, RF-4C and E-3 fly everyday for frantic aerial espionage against the DPRK from March 9 to 20.
					
					 At least 20 cases of aerial espionage were perpetrated by U-2 of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea.
					
					 RC-135 of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces made shuttle flights from the air over waters off Musudan, North Hamgyong Province, to the air over waters east of Wonsan on March 13, 17 and 22 to perpetrate aerial observation, photographing and electronic espionage against strategic targets in the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists perpetrated the above-said aerial espionage after deploying even "intercepting" means in the East Sea of Korea, describing the DPRK's projected satellite launch as "a missile launch." This is a wanton infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and another dangerous military provocation to it.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers had better bear in mind that RC-135 and all other spy planes perpetrating espionage against the DPRK are within the range of its strikes.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Struggle Unabated in Seoul
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Struggle Unabated in Seoul
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan of south Korea held a candlelight rally in Seoul on March 28 demanding  the probe into the truth about the murder of evacuees and the punishment of its prime mover.
					 Speakers at the rally deplored that it is a long time since a tragedy took place in Ryongsan but the main culprits of the murder have not yet been punished.
					
					 They declared that they would expand their movement to probe the truth about the murder and mete out a stern judgment to the main culprits at the public court.
					
					 An appeal read out there said the people would unite as one and launch widespread actions to hold in check the authorities' moves for "re-development", which might spark off the second and third Ryongsan tragedies and punish the arrogant "government" and the ruling party.
					
					 In another development, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the "National Government Employees' Union" and youth and children's organizations separately staged actions in Seoul that day in protest against the authorities' misrule.

articles.title: Korean Exhibition Held in Peru
articles.content:
Korean Exhibition Held in Peru
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition took place in Peru from March 18 to 25. 
					 On display at the exhibition hall were books and photographs introducing Songun Korea and handicraft associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 It was visited by the governor of Tayacaja City in Huancavelica Province and members of the city council, personages of different circles and popular masses.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Jon Ki Ryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Jon Ki Ryon
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 31 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Jon Ki Ryon, general del EPC, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Informacion de ATCC
articles.content:
Informacion de ATCC
						
  Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ATCC) -- Segun el resultado intermedio de investigacion de un organo competente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fueron confirmadas la entrada ilegal de las periodistas norteamericanas en el pais y las sospechas de sus acciones hostiles a traves de las pruebas y sus confesiones.
					  El organo prosigue la investigacion preparandose para someterlos al juicio bajo las sospechas ya confirmadas.
					
					  El proceso de pesquisa, el contacto entre instituciones consulares, el trato a las retenidas y otras labores se realizan de acuerdo con las leyes internacionales correspondientes.

articles.title: UPC condena represion de Lee Myung Bak contra la prensa
articles.content:
UPC condena represion de Lee Myung Bak contra la prensa
  Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Periodistas de Corea (UPC) publico el dia 30 una declaracion en relacion con que ahora se tornan mas perversas las maquinaciones de la banda de Lee Myung Bak para   reprimir y controlar los medios de prensa.
					  Despues de tomar el poder, la banda de Lee Myung Bak sustituyo al presidente del Comite de Radio e Informacion que dirige los medios de radio e informacion del Sur de Corea y a los caudillos de  las importantes radioemisoras y otros organos de prensa por sus lacayos a fin de reprimir los medios de palabra progresista y controlarlos en su conjunto. En estos dias, enmienda las leyes concernientes a la prensa para que Chosun Ilbo, Dong-a Ilbo y otros periodicos venales  monopolicen   las radios, senala el documento y continua:
					
					  Por otra parte, reprime despiadadamente a los medios de  prensa que le disgustan.
					
					  Tales maquinaciones de la banda traidora  constituyen el imperdonable acto antidemocratico y antinacional para convertir los medios de prensa en los aparatos venales que sirvan a su establecimiento del sistema de dominacion fascista y su complot de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  La prensa es el portavoz de la justicia y el conductor de la epoca.
					
					  Pero, debido a la represion fascista de la banda traidora, en el Sur de Corea los medios de prensa, que deben transmitir la verdad, no desempenan su rol  y, al contrario, las prensas conservadoras ultraderechistas inducen en error la opinion publica lisonjeando a la camarilla titere. 
					
					  No tienen lugar de situarse para los medios y hombres de prensa que inculcan la hostilidad, la desconfianza y la confrontacion entre los connacionales en contubernio con la banda de traidores.
					
					  Daremos clara cuenta de los medios y hombres de prensa conservadores del Sur de Corea que calumnian perversamente a la RPDC sirviendo de clarinete venal de la banda de Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: ATCC comenta farsa de Japon en cuanto al tema de satelite
articles.content:
ATCC comenta farsa de Japon en cuanto al tema de satelite
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ATCC) -- En estos tiempos, las fuerzas malsanas enloquecidas por atropellar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea andan descabelladamente para impedir el lanzamiento del satelite piloto de comunicaciones "Kwangmyongsong No. 2" con fines pacificos, planeado por ella.
					Al frente de tal campana esta Japon que cometio peores crimenes contra la RPDC.
					
					 El premier Aso y otras autoridades japonesas dicen atrevidamente que van a interceptar ese satelite insistiendo en que su lanzamiento deviene una "amenaza" a la seguridad de su pais.
					
					 Practicamente, los misiles interceptores desde el mar y la tierra y los medios de vigilancia de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon se trasladan y se ubican en el Mar Este de Corea y su contorno.
					
					  Ademas, ellas amenazan con tomar de manera independiente las medidas adicionales de sancion en el caso de que se lleve a cabo el lanzamiento de satelite y con someter este asunto al debate del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					 Esperando el apoyo de su amo, ellas habian actuado con fanfarroneria jurando "interceptar" nuestro satelite artificial.
					
					 Pero, cuando su amo se hizo el sueco cohibido por la rotunda posicion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvieron que pronunciar las bochornosas palabras de "interceptar solo en el caso de que caigan en el territorio japones los segmentos del cohete transportador del satelite". 
					
					 Japon arma escandalos insistiendo sin ton ni son en que el lanzamiento de satelite por nuestro pais es el desarrollo de la tecnologia de misil.
					
					 El objetivo de esta marana reside en primer lugar en dar razon a su ambicion de armamentismo nuclear llevando al colapso las conversaciones a 6 bandas y obstaculizando la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Si echamos una vista retrospectiva al pasado, desde el inicio de esas negociaciones hasta la fecha, Japon incurrio siempre en las maldades que obstaculizaron la desnuclearizacion, como lo reconocen no solo los paises participantes en este dialogo sino todo el mundo.
					
					  Ese pais isleno se opuso obstinadamente a la eliminacion de nuestro pais en la lista de los "paises que apoyan el terrorismo" y eludio a toda costa su obligacion de suministrar la energia impidiendo asi a cada paso la ejecucion del principio de "accion vs. accion" para la desnuclearizacion.
					
					  En segundo lugar, Japon quiere aprovechar al maximo la cuestion de satelite para militarizar la sociedad japonesa y atenuar la crisis politica interna.
					
					  Como confesaron las autoridades japonesas, estas no tienen ninguna garantia ni conviccion de interceptar nuestro satelite artificial.
					
					  Lo que persiguen ellas es las utilidades politicas y militares que tendran en el proceso de rechazo al plan espacial de la RPDC.
					
					 En otras palabras, tratan de centrar en la "amenaza a la seguridad" la mirada de los habitantes japoneses desilusionados del corrupto panorama politico de Japon.
					
					 De esta manera, pretenden conseguir el tiempo para inculcar el militarismo y arreglar la crisis politica, y preparar el trampolin para impulsar en etapa crucial los proyectos para la conversion de su pais en una potencia militar incluyendo el emplazamiento con EE.UU. del sistema antimisiles. 
					
					  Partiendo de este tan sucio objetivo, Japon se muestra tan entusiasta en difundir el rumor de la "amenaza de misiles del Norte de Corea".
					
					  Tal conducta del pais isleno, que recurre a todos los actos hostiles como el chantaje de guerra cuestionando solo el lanzamiento de satelite de nuestro pais como desarrollo de la tecnica de misil, da lo mismo que dar vuelco a las conversaciones a 6 bandas, siendo la declaracion de que no reconoce la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre que estipulo materializar el "espiritu del respeto mutuo  y la igualdad".
					
					  No tenemos ningun miedo a que Japon intente o no interceptar el "Kwangmyongsong No. 2".
					
					   Si Japon se atreve a pasar a la aventurera interceptacion, el ejercito coreano lo considerara como el comienzo de la guerra de nueva agresion por parte de ese pais criminal de guerra a mas de 60 anos despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial y destruira implacablemente con el mas poderoso medio militar todos los medios de interceptacion y sus bases.
